General.Name: Mediterranean Towers Ltd
General.Description: Mediterranean Towers Ltd. operates a chain of retirement communities in Israel. The company operates and manages residential units in retirement community complexes in Bat Yam, Kfar Saba, Nordia, Savyon Ramat Hasharon, and Jerusalem and Ganei Tikva. Mediterranean Towers Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

2.Name: Mr. Tomer  Rosenberg
2.Title: VP of Operations & Sales and COO
